author: wsjcom
title: Turks and Israelis Share a Similar Concern on Borders
text:
In reading Ambassador Serdar Kilic’s letter (Feb. 13), few would disagree with his statement that: “Turkey will never let any piece of land, anywhere along its borders, to be used as a staging ground for terror attacks against its citizens.”
This brings to my mind how very fortunate America is to have such good neighbors in Canada and Mexico on our lengthy borders. Also, isn’t this what Israel has been saying for at least 50 years?
...
